Text:
I cant get audio to work in any of your wrong turn movies...

What am I doing wrong?
I have installed latest AC3 filters.

Not sure, might be missing an AC3 filter on your system?

I recommend using ffdshow on Windows:
http://www.afterdawn.com/software/audio_video/codecs/ffdshow.cfm
or
http://www.afterdawn.com/software/audio_video/codecs/ffdshow64.cfm

As someone pointed out to me over at Demonoid, the audio in this release and Wrong Turn 2 suffered the AC3 encoding bug. I'll do another one.
